content.text: Hi, I'm a mom with two sons and a husband.
Nice to meet you! I spend as much time as I can with my family.
That's nice! I'd love to have a home where I can entertain my friends and play my Lindsey Stirling albums loud.
That sounds like fun! I love playing music and listening to music.
Nice! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play the piano and I love listening to all kinds of music. I love to go to concerts and listen to live music.
I love going to concerts too! I saw Lindsey Stirling in concert a few years ago. She was amazing!
I've heard great things about her! I'd love to see her in concert someday.
It was a great show! She's an incredible musician.
I'm sure it was! I'll have to keep an eye out for when she's in town again.
Yeah, you should! She's definitely worth seeing live.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
No problem! I love sharing music with people.
I love listening to new music
